name: Astral Chart (Jae Won (Agnes) Lee)
description:
A brand new adventure, open world, combat experience in which you play as a mercenary exploring the vast regions of empires in multiple solar systems.

In the grand scale of the factions controlling the empire, you, a lone mercenary, are left with the responsibility of the Unstoppable Force, a small but agile spaceship capable of avoiding powerful firepower with a skilled pilot. Weapons not included.

Luckily, there are plenty of factions willing to offer you dangerous bounties only a mercenary with neutral standing could accept, providing powerful weapons compatible with your ship should you succeed. Pursue dangerous bounties, and build an arsenal of weapons capable of taking down foes of all kinds of fighting styles.

For more information, please visit the game's website

--- Credits ---

Zhi Zheng, Wyatt Marvil, Ivan Ho, Benny Woolbert, Jae Won (Agnes) Lee, Xander Johnson, Haoyang Liu, Sean Thornton, Zoe Ziegler
